guide.title: GDP International Status Report: March 2004
guide.abstract: Monthly international status report of GDP lead translators.

body.p: The Gentoo Documentation Project, from now on abbreviated to GDP, has its own project page (just like almost all other Gentoo projects). You can find it at http://www.gentoo.org/proj/en/gdp.

GDP Lead Translators are kindly asked to post the status of their team every month. Those statuses will be summed up here monthly. All questions can be posted to gentoo-doc@gentoo.org or to Xavier Neys.
New languages are being worked on:
Good luck to our new contributors. Let's hope that official teams will be able to see the light.

ul.li: Steven Lecompte aka Rip7 is about to take the role of Lead Translator and Blubber steps down as his follow-up due to lack of time.
Camille Huot aka Cam has been appointed as new French follow-up.
Translations have been improved and kept up to date.
